group_1.textRight: So you were another Magical Girl?@My name's Meiyui Chun.

group_1.textLeft: Umika Misaki. I came here from Asunaro City.

group_1.textRight: Ahh, so that's where you're from...@I'll never forgive Asunaro City.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?
Meiyui, Umika has nothing to do with the Magical@Girl hunters...!

group_1.textRight: Who cares about that?! The problem here is@Slice Akiyama!

group_1.textLeft: Slice Akiyama? The bodybuilder chef...?

group_1.textRight: Yes, him. His new shop is opening in Asunaro City.
Why not Kamihama?

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh. That's all it is...

group_1.textRight: "That's all"? No! That man ran away@in the face of a challenge.
Kamihama's Blue Seas Family... our tongues are all@VERY keen. He went with Asunaro as the safe option.

group_1.textLeft: What sort of organization is the Blue Seas Family?

group_1.textRight: It's a local group that helps people in trouble.@"Nowadays," at least.
But its past was a little more dangerous. If you look@into it, you'll be peeking into dark corners of society.

group_1.textLeft: ...Sounds like good research material for a story@with a lot of social commentary.
I suppose I'll have to pass on hearing about its@"past," though. At least for now.
Could I perhaps ask the Family's network for@assistance in finding my friends?

group_1.textRight: That? Already done.
But nobody had seen Kazumi or Kaoru...@I'm sorry.

group_1.textLeft: No, thank you for investigating all the same.
Guess we've got our work cut out for us if even@the Blue Seas Family can't find 'em.

group_1.textRight: No problem there. Nanaka gave me some info.

group_1.textLeft: Nanaka did?!@So she called you up too...

group_1.textRight: Who's this "Nanaka"?

group_1.textLeft: Another of our team members.@She's very, very reliable!

group_1.textRight: She looked into a lot of things and contacted me@after Kako phoned her.

group_1.textCenter: ...There are some unpleasant rumors about the@Magical Girls in Asunaro.
But just as there's a wide variety of girls in our city...
There's sure to be both good and bad Magical Girls@in Asunaro, too.
First, I want the three of you to observe her and@determine whether or not she's an enemy.

group_1.textRight: She said only to share her information with you@if you're trustworthy.
Hey, I trust you! Like I just said, right?

group_1.textLeft: I trust you too, Umika.

group_1.textRight: One question.
How did you like the taste of Slice Akiyama's food...?

group_1.textLeft: It tasted delicious. Very genuine.

group_1.textRight: What's this...?!
You'd praise him, Umika? Even though I was just@complaining about him?

group_1.textLeft: I wouldn't lie to someone whose trust@I'm hoping to gain.
But... I don't think I'll be going there again.

group_1.textRight: Why? You just said it was delicious.

group_1.textLeft: I mean, would YOU want to visit a restaurant with@photos of a shirtless old man all over the walls?

group_1.textRight: Pfft...! Okay, I like you!@I'll trust you, Umika.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.

group_1.textRight: This is the information Nanaka gave.

group_1.textCenter: I've heard reports of an unfamiliar Magical Girl@sighted in various locations throughout the city.
Sankyoin Academy, Suitoku Shopping Center...@Chuo Stock Exchange... Sankyoin First Playground...
They say she's clothed mostly in yellow, and she was@sprinting too fast to even see for more than@a moment.

group_1.textLeft: A yellow Magical Girl sprinting around?@That's got to be Kaoru.

group_1.textRight: It's her after all? Sounds like a big clue.

group_1.textLeft: Yes... But I'm searching for another besides Kaoru.@Her name's Kazumi.
She's got short-cut hair with what you'd call a@"cowlick," and she typically wears a pair of@red overalls.
In her Magical Girl form, she's mostly clad in black@with a large hat and cape...

group_1.textRight: No sightings of any girl like that.@But Nanaka also said...

group_1.textCenter: If there's only one unconfirmed Magical Girl,@doesn't that seem intriguing?
Just where was Miss Yellow sprinting towards?
I think that's the key thing that connects these girls@from Asunaro City.

group_1.textLeft: Where Kaoru was going?@That's the key...?

group_1.textRight: Nanaka's busy with Witch hunting, too. She couldn't stay any longer than that.

group_1.textLeft: ...Still, though, this is all pretty darn thoughtful@of her!

group_1.textRight: I said the same thing.@When she heard that...

group_1.textCenter: Is it really that strange for me to be considerate@of others...?

group_1.textRight: She sounded a little embarrassed over the phone!

group_1.textLeft: Dang, I kinda wish I'd seen it in person...!

group_1.textRight: Haha. I wish I could've seen her face as@she said it, too.
*Chuckle*...

group_1.textLeft: Umika...?

group_1.textRight: You all make a lovely team.@I'm glad I got to meet you.

group_1.textLeft: ...Thank you!

group_1.textRight: A'ight, so should we split up and check the places@Nanaka mentioned?
Kako, is something concerning you?

group_1.textLeft: N-no... It's nothing.

group_1.textRight: "It's nothing" means that it's totally something,@right?
There's no need for you to be reserved around us,@of all people.

group_1.textLeft: But it's not as if I've figured out Kaoru's location...

group_1.textRight: Please, Kako.
I feel like I'm close to finding the answer.@So... I want you to guide me!
